meanings: (an undisciplined) mob, a disorderly crowd, rabble, ruck

examples.korean: a ragtag band of rebels 발음듣기 오합지졸에 불과한 반란군 무리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a ragtag band of rebels 발음

examples.korean: Most voters are just a bunch of sheep. 발음듣기 유권자들 대부분은 오합지졸에 지나지 않습니다. Neungyule
examples.english: Most voters are just a bunch of sheep. 발음

examples.korean: This group is more like a mob[bunch of people] than an organization. 발음듣기 이 집단은 조직이라기보다 오합지졸에 가깝다 Neungyule
examples.english: This group is more like a mob[bunch of people] than an organization. 발음

examples.korean: I saw all Israel scattered upon the mountains, as sheep that have no shepherd. 발음듣기 나는 모든 이스라엘인들이 마치 양치기를 잃은 양처럼(오합지졸처럼) 여러 산에 흩어진 것을 보았습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I saw all Israel scattered upon the mountains, as sheep that have no shepherd. 발음

examples.korean: The class was sheep that have no shepherd. 발음듣기 반은 오합지졸이었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The class was sheep that have no shepherd. 발음
